mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mnum, memail, mpwd, mnick, mname, mgender, mbirth, mdate, locnum) VALUES (seq_member.nextVal, #{memail}, #{mpwd}, #{mnick}, #{mname}, #{mgender}, #{mbirth}, sysdate, #{locnum})
mapper.update: update member set mimgn = #{mimgn} where mnum=#{mnum}
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from member where mnick=#{mnick}
mapper.update: update member set mnick=#{mnick}, mpwd=#{mpwd}, locnum=#{locnum} where mnum=#{mnum}
mapper.select: select * from ai_res where mnum = #{mnum} order by rdate DESC
mapper.update: update member set season=#{season} where mnum=#{mnum}
